mapper.select: SELECT MEMBERSEQ, EMAIL , NICKNAME , PHONE , BIRTHDAY , GENDER , AUTH , USERSTATUS ,MENTORTIER, REPORTCNT , TO_CHAR(JOINDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS JOINDATE , MENTEECNT, MENTEEACCSTAR, TO_CHAR(LASTACCESS, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS LASTACCESS, BYEBYE FROM NAEMEMBER WHERE AUTH != 'ROLE_A' ORDER BY AUTH

SELECT MEMBERSEQ, EMAIL , NICKNAME , PHONE , BIRTHDAY , GENDER , AUTH , USERSTATUS ,MENTORTIER, REPORTCNT , TO_CHAR(JOINDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS JOINDATE , MENTEECNT, MENTEEACCSTAR, TO_CHAR(LASTACCESS, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS LASTACCESS, BYEBYE FROM NAEMEMBER WHERE MEMBERSEQ = #{memberseq}

SELECT BOARDSEQ, TITLE , CONTENT , WRITESDATE , REPORTCNT , SPECIALFIELD, TARGET , MENTEELEVEL , HOWTO, LOCATION , DELFLAG , MENTORLIST , FINDREPORTER FROM FINDINGMENTOR f WHERE REPORTCNT >= 1 AND DELFLAG = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE FINDINGMENTOR SET DELFLAG = 'Y' WHERE REPORTCNT > '4'
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBERSEQ, EMAIL , NICKNAME , PHONE , BIRTHDAY , GENDER , AUTH , USERSTATUS ,MENTORTIER, REPORTCNT , JOINDATE , MENTEECNT, MENTEEACCSTAR, LASTACCESS , BYEBYE FROM NAEMEMBER WHERE BYEBYE = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE NAEMEMBER SET USERSTATUS = 'D' WHERE BYEBYE = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT n.MEMBERSEQ, AUTH, EMAIL, NICKNAME, INTRODUCE, PHONE, BIRTHDAY, GENDER, REPORTCNT, JOINDATE, PHOTO, SCHOOL, MAJOR, CAREER, CERTIFICATE, SPECIALFIELD, MENTOACCSTAR, FILECHK, USERFILE, TO_CHAR(UPLOADDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPLOADDATE FROM NAEMEMBER n JOIN PROFILE p ON n.MEMBERSEQ = p.MEMBERSEQ JOIN ATTACHFILE a ON n.MEMBERSEQ = a.MEMBERSEQ WHERE FILECHK = 'Y' AND NOT AUTH = 'ROLE_R' AND NOT AUTH = 'ROLE_A' ORDER BY UPLOADDATE

SELECT * FROM(SELECT MEMBERSEQ, EMAIL , NICKNAME , PHONE , BIRTHDAY , GENDER , AUTH , USERSTATUS ,MENTORTIER, REPORTCNT , TO_CHAR(JOINDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS JOINDATE , MENTEECNT, MENTEEACCSTAR, TO_CHAR(LASTACCESS, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS LASTACCESS, BYEBYE , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY AUTH) AS "RN" FROM NAEMEMBER WHERE AUTH = 'ROLE_R') WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{last}
